column1: | obituaries| obituaries. pageshome categories. obituaries mary beth henning. june 14
column6: 2015 at the age of 81. born september 26
column8: she was the daughter of carson and eva (matthews) shinabery. mary beth was a member of st. joseph catholic church. on june 8
column9: 1957 she married dale l. henning and he preceded her in death in 1995. surviving are her children linda (kevin) whitbeck of de. witt
column14: leslie (robert) zache of niles; 10 grandchildren; 4 great grandchildren; brothers
column17: chris shinabery; and many nieces and nephews. along with her husband
column18: mary beth was preceded in death by her parents and brother
column19: max shinabery. funeral mass of christian burial will be celebrated 10:00 am wednesday
column22: st. johns with fr. michael williams presiding. burial will follow at eureka cemetery. the family will receive friends from 6-8 pm monday
column24: june 16 at osgood funeral home. a vigil service will be prayed at 7 pm tuesday. in lieu of flowers
column25: contributions may be made in mary beths name to hospice house of mid-michigan
column28: mi 48915. the family is being served by the osgood funeral homes
